wizard.same-password: The password and confirm password should match

receive.prompt: Please use the official Neuron wallet to check balance and process transactions after CKB mainnet launch.

messages.addr-copied: Address has been copied to the clipboard
messages.qrcode-copied: QR Code has been copied to the clipboard

codes.203: $t(messages.fields.{{fieldName}}) {{fieldValue}} is too long, it should be shorter than or equal to {{length}}
codes.204: $t(messages.fields.{{fieldName}}) {{fieldValue}} is too short, it should be longer than or equal to {{length}}
codes.206: $t(messages.fields.{{fieldName}}) {{fieldValue}} is invalid, please enter the $t(messages.fields.{{fieldName}}) with no more than {{length}} decimal places
codes.207: $t(messages.fields.{{fieldName}}) {{fieldValue}} is invalid, it cannot be negative
codes.208: $t(messages.fields.{{fieldName}}) {{fieldValue}} is invalid, it should start with http(s)://
